projects.description:
Camelot Trust
Sep 2017 – Aug 2018

Project descriptionCamelot Trust Pte Ltd was established in 2004 in Singapore with local presence in New Zealand, Cyprus and Hong Kong and access to professional networks around the world. Their principals are mainly qualified lawyers, trust practitioners and company secretaries from Asia and Europe.
In order to manage their clients, Camelot trust build the application which contains two main parts which are capture the client information and provision those to their clients. In addition Camelot trust application have capability to connect their internal systems such as Viewpoint, Auto count and Cynposis.
The solution was deployed on AWs environment.Dialog - Repair center
Apr 2017 – Aug 2017

Project descriptionDialog is one of the largest telecommunication provider in Sri Lanka. Dialog was running lot of internal application to manage their customer services and their internal service. 

Dialog Repair center system is one of their internal application, and currently the application tightly coupled with their internal systems. Because of that the system will not perform as their expected performance. In order achieve the best performance Dialog decided to move their components one by one to micro service architecture from monolithic architecture.CCP
Nov 2015 – Feb 2017

Project descriptionMillennium information technology developing the clearing system called Counter clearing party (CCP) by using C++ language and distributed system architecture. In order to evaluate the distributed system components the system developed called CCPTest by using Java. The framework have the capacity to simulate the real system and support to do the component testing and end to end testing. 
I was worked with gateways team, which one of the technical team in CCP Project and specially involved on interpret the gateway messages with using various technologies such as JAXB, String manipulation, XML parsers… etc. Had the experience on FIX, FIXML 4.0, 4.2, 4.4, 5.0, SWIFT, CREST, SOCGEN… etc.Evinta Weight and Balance System for WIZZ and VIM air
Feb 2015 – Oct 2015

Project descriptionDeveloped a web based aircraft weight and balance application for aeroport handlers at KIV airport located in Chisinau, which was supported to bulk loading type aircraft such as A320 series. The aeroport handlers handle the multiple airlines at KIV airport. In the initial phase WIZZ and VIM airlines were implemented on Evinta Weight and Balance system. The WIZZ and VIM airlines had 63 and four aircraft registrations respectively, and all of them are moved to Evinta Weight and Balance System. The Evinta Weight and Balance application calculate the center of gravity (COG) and validate the COG within the envelope by using the Index based calculations. In addition, the application has the admin functionality in order to maintain the aircraft handling manual (AHM) data for the Evinta Weight and Balance system. It simplifies the complicated process of planning and distributing weights of an aircraft such as fuel, cargo, mail, etc through an easy to use visually simulated process.Kenyan airways Corporate Booking Engine
May 2013 – Oct 2015

Project descriptionDeveloped a corporate booking engine (CBE) for Kenya airways. The corporate booking engine helps SMEs and corporate clients to make online flight reservation (searched by date and by fare) using different payment options such as credit cards, on hold, on account and on mobile. In addition to making a online booking, the user has the booking amendment functions such as cancel itinerary, cancel segment, refund, split, reschedule (date change / booking upgrade / flight change) . The CBE also has an administration module to maintain the Corporate user accounts, maintain the discounts, commissions, approval process, diagnostic screens and the reports etc. The CBE integrates with Amadeus altea GDS web services for flight availability and the reservations.Evinta Weight and Balance
Jan 2013

Project descriptionThe Evinta Weight and Balance is an integrated web solution designed to streamline functionalities in the weight and balance process. It simplifies the complicated process of planning and distributing weights of an aircraft such as fuel, cargo, mail, etc through an easy to use visually simulated process

EJB 3.0, Spring Framework ,Apache Strut
DBMS:-Oracle
Tools:-Apache Log4j,Eclipse,JKCS FrameworkGMG Airlines - Internet Booking Engine
Jun 2011 – Aug 2011

Project descriptionDeveloped for GMG airline, a Bangladesh based airline. Application is an Internet Booking Engine that enables its users to make an online flight booking using a payment option such as credit cards. The system also has an administration module to maintain Travel Agent user accounts, maintain/calculate commissions for Travel Agents, view reports etc. The IBE integrates with Mars GDS web services for flight availability and reservations. In addition the system has web check in functionality also.FindMyFare - Airline Agent
Dec 2010 – Jun 2011

Project descriptionFind my fare project is airline reservation domain base web application. Find my fare is one of the airline agent and they are doing the airline reservation for multiple air lines. This application contains the IBE and Admin modules. The application integrated with World span GDS.

jobs.description:
Project: AWS Migration Consultation  - CAL (Capital Alliance, Asia region) 

Capital Alliance, one of the leading investment banks in Asian region required a solution to their aging problem of data inconsistencies and customer duplication. Through analyzing the problem, CAL decided to look into integrating all of their systems, eliminate redundancies and increase integrity of customer data.

CAL lacked expertise in areas such as Cloud Computing and systems integration to proceed with integrating their business systems and identified Mitra Innovation as an expert organization to help them to migrate their on premise infrastructure to AWS cloud. 

Roles: Infrastructure Consultant

Technology Stack : AWS EC2, AWS S3, AWS Cloudwatch, AWS Lambda Functions, AWS Site to Site VPN, AWS Route 53, etc..

Project : Big Data Platform – Beyond Analysis, UK

Beyond Analysis Limited was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in London, United Kingdom with additional offices in Sydney, Australia, and Singapore. The company provides marketing services to help their clients turn data into actionable insights that enable decision making. The company also provides customer insights and CRM solutions that offer insight-based marketing decisions on targeting and segmentation, content, channel, and timing; store optimiser solutions; and consulting services by exploring data sources and understanding the available opportunities.

Role : Solution Architect

Technology Stack : Python, React JS, JavaScript, Node JS, Angular, Spring XD, WSO2 ESB, Zero MQ, AWS Lambda, AWS EC2, AWS Redshift, AWS Athena, AWS RDS, AWS Cloudwatch, AWS EMR, AWS Elastic Cache, AWS S3, Qlik Sense, Apache Superset & Apache Airflow

Project nameSiemens Energy RNA | REU
Jan 2013 – Jan 2014

Project descriptionSiemens Energy Sector is one of the world’s leading suppliers of a wide range of products, solutions and services in the field of energy technology. The Field Report Writer (FRW) is an application used by Field Engineers, Technical Officers, Sales Teams and other Divisions to generate and manage various types of field reports. Currently different versions of FRW applications are used in two main geographical regions named Region North America (RNA) and Region European Union (REU). The FRW is a client-server application with a workflow engine. The main objective of this project is to re-engineer the current RNA/REU server side (including the workflow) and the client side applications and develop a common application which is compatible for both the regions to ease the maintainability and extensibility. The secondary objective is to use Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) instead of Microsoft InfoPath to enhance the look and feel and the user experience while using Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) for client server communications.

Other creators

Analyzing consumer usability,
Developing information architecture,

Building design interfaces,
responsible to test the architecture of a digital site, taking it from concept to launch. Conceptualizing, designing and beta testing web application interactions while being analytical and creative.
